name: Street Fighter Online
description:
Relive the old times of the coin operated fighting machines and play Street Fighter Online on your computer.

Features:

  • Single Player Gameplay with different stories ("Awakening","Dawn of Rage", "The Last Five" and "Destination Weapon X"
  • Online Multiplayer Gameplay (1vs1, 1vs1 tag, 2vs2, 2vs 2 Tag)
  • Different Online Multiplayer Modes (Brawl,DWX,Unvindicated,Primal,Survivor,Max-1)
  • The Missing Chronicles (TMC) (Custom Stories made by SFO Staff and members)
  • Worldwide Leaderboard Ranking (http://sfo.gotdns.com/xmen2k1/index.html)
  • and awhole lot more!
